nodes.id: 中国华能集团有限公司

zh-cn: 中国华能集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 以经营电力产业为主的中国国有中央企业，由国务院国有资产监督管理委员会监管。2017年12月由全民所有制工业企业改为国有独资有限公司。
description.en: A Chinese state-owned central enterprise primarily engaged in the power industry, supervised by the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council (SASAC). In December 2017, it was transformed from an enterprise owned by the whole people into a wholly state-owned limited liability company.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中国华能集团有限公司董事长。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, serving as the Chairman of China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中国华能集团有限公司总经理。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, serving as the General Manager of China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd.

nodes.id: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会
en: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的特设机构，代表国家履行中央企业出资人职责。
description.en: A special commission of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing state-owned enterprises on behalf of the state.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央人民政府，是最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, serving as the highest state administrative organ.

zh-cn: 华能国际电力股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国华能集团有限公司的子公司，为在纽约、香港、上海三地上市的发电公司。
description.en: A subsidiary of China Huaneng Group, a power generation company listed in New York, Hong Kong, and Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 一家在上海证券交易所上市的电力公司，由北方联合电力控股。
description.en: A power company listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange, controlled by North United Power Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 中国华能集团有限公司控股的上市公司。
description.en: A listed company controlled by China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 中国华能集团有限公司控股的上市公司，主要从事水电项目的开发、投资、建设、运营与管理。
description.en: A listed company controlled by China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd., primarily engaged in the development, investment, construction, operation, and management of hydropower projects.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家计划委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，主管全国经济计划。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national economic planning.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国水利电力部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责水利和电力工业的管理。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the administration of water conservancy and the electric power industry.

description.zh-cn: 中国在1980年代成立的一家公司，其部分资产后转入中国华能集团。
description.en: A company established in China in the 1980s, some of whose assets were later transferred to China Huaneng Group.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责管理全国电力工业。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing the national electric power industry.

description.zh-cn: 曾管理中国国家电网的国有公司，在2002年电力体制改革中被撤销。
description.en: A former state-owned company that managed China's national power grid, which was dissolved in the 2002 power system reform.

description.zh-cn: 2002年中华人民共和国国务院印发的文件，旨在改革中国的电力系统，导致了国家电力公司的撤销和电力市场的重组。
description.en: A document issued by the State Council of the People's Republic of China in 2002, aimed at reforming China's power system, which led to the dissolution of the State Power Corporation and the restructuring of the electricity market.

description.zh-cn: 中国华能集团有限公司的控股子公司，总部位于内蒙古自治区。
description.en: A holding subsidiary of China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd., headquartered in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

nodes.id: 内蒙古自治区人民政府

zh-cn: 内蒙古自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国内蒙古自治区的省级行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative organ of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 华能新能源股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国华能集团有限公司的子公司，主要从事风力发电等新能源项目的开发和运营。
description.en: A subsidiary of China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd., primarily engaged in the development and operation of new energy projects such as wind power generation.

description.zh-cn: 中国一家大型保险金融服务集团。
description.en: A large insurance and financial services group in China.

nodes.id: 华能国际电力开发公司

zh-cn: 华能国际电力开发公司

description.zh-cn: 中国华能集团有限公司的创始核心子公司之一，成立于1985年。
description.en: One of the founding core subsidiaries of China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd., established in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 中国华能集团有限公司的前子公司，于1995年从集团中分立，成为神华集团的基础。
description.en: A former subsidiary of China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd., which was spun off from the group in 1995 to form the basis of Shenhua Group.

description.zh-cn: 由原华能精煤公司于1995年分立而成的独立国有企业集团。
description.en: An independent state-owned enterprise group formed in 1995 from the spin-off of the former Huaneng Fine Coal Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国河北省的国家级新区，是中国华能集团有限公司总部所在地。
description.en: A state-level new area in Hebei Province, China, and the location of the headquarters of China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd.

description.en: Several 'Huaneng-system' companies under the State Planning Commission's Office for Coal substituting Oil formed the basis for the establishment of China Huaneng Group in 1989.

relationships.target: 中国华能集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 原水电部管理的四家公司在1989年并入新成立的中国华能集团。
description.en: Four companies formerly managed by the Ministry of Water Resources and Electric Power were merged into the newly established China Huaneng Group in 1989.

relationships.target: 中国华能集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 康华发展总公司旗下的康华国际易货贸易公司于1988年底转入中国华能集团。
description.en: Kanghua International Barter Trade Company, a subsidiary of Kanghua Development Corporation, was transferred to China Huaneng Group at the end of 1988.

relationships.source: 中国华能集团有限公司
relationships.target: 电力工业部

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，华能集团主要由电力工业部管理。
description.en: Starting from 1993, Huaneng Group was mainly managed by the Ministry of Electric Power Industry.

relationships.source: 中国华能集团有限公司
relationships.target: 国家电力公司

description.zh-cn: 1997年至2002年间，华能集团是国家电力公司的子公司。
description.en: From 1997 to 2002, Huaneng Group was a subsidiary of the State Power Corporation.

relationships.target: 国家电力公司

description.zh-cn: 2002年的《电力体制改革方案》导致国家电力公司被撤销。
description.en: The 'Power System Reform Plan' of 2002 led to the dissolution of the State Power Corporation.

relationships.target: 中国华能集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 根据《电力体制改革方案》，国家电力公司被撤销，华能集团接收了部分原国家电力公司资产（如华能澜沧江水电），并成为由国资委直接监管的中央企业。
description.en: According to the 'Power System Reform Plan', the State Power Corporation was dissolved, and Huaneng Group received some of its assets (such as Huaneng Lancang River Hydropower) and became a central enterprise directly supervised by SASAC.

relationships.source: 华能国际电力开发公司
relationships.target: 中国华能集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 华能国际电力开发公司是1989年中国华能集团成立时的主要子公司之一。
description.en: Huaneng International Power Development Corporation was one of the main subsidiaries when China Huaneng Group was established in 1989.

relationships.target: 中国华能集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 华能精煤公司是中国华能集团的创始子公司之一，于1995年从集团中分立。
description.en: Huaneng Fine Coal Corporation was one of the founding subsidiaries of China Huaneng Group and was spun off from the group in 1995.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 神华集团

description.zh-cn: 1995年，根据国务院批复，原属华能集团的华能精煤公司分立为独立的国有企业神华集团。
description.en: In 1995, with the approval of the State Council, the former Huaneng Fine Coal Corporation, which was part of Huaneng Group, was spun off to become the independent state-owned enterprise Shenhua Group.

description.en: In 1994, Huaneng International Power Development Corporation spun off assets for a public listing, establishing its sub-subsidiary Huaneng International Power Inc.

relationships.target: 中国华能集团有限公司

description.zh-cn: 2002年电力体制改革后，原云南澜沧江水电开发公司划归华能集团，成为其控股子公司。
